name: petrodollar
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a unit of money earned by countries that produce petroleum for sale to other countries: Petrodollars have maintained Kuwait's wealth.

ECONOMICS, MONEY, NATURAL RESOURCES a unit of money earned by countries that produce oil for sale to other countries: Petrodollars have maintained the country's wealth.
